verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's only One strong enough to save
There's only One who overcame the grave
There's only One who's worthy of all praise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And in His hands, the keys of death and hell
And in his name, a power that can heal
And by His blood, our sins are washed away

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
His name is Jesus
His name is Jesus
His name is Wonderful, Counselor, Almighty God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
All nations kneel
And glorify the Lord
Let all the earth tremble for He comes
And He will judge the living and the dead

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The Son of Man coming on the clouds
With trumpet sound and every knee will bow
And tongue confess the Name above all names

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
He is Counselor
He is Mighty God
He's the Prince of Peace
The Omnipotent
He is Wonderful
He is Radiant
The Almighty God

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
We worship You
We gives our lives to You
Lord, we sing out
Yes, we cry out
